code: import React from'react';import'./style.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const translations={'pt-BR':{title:'Experiência',company:'EmComp - Empresa Júnior da Computação',position:'Desenvolvedora Full-Stack',type:'Tempo Integral',date:'Maio de 2023 - Presente',location:'Rio Pomba, Minas Gerais, Brasil',description:'Trabalho voluntário como desenvolvedora Full-Stack na EmComp, participando de projetos de desenvolvimento de software e soluções tecnológicas para clientes e parceiros da empresa júnior.'},en:{title:'Experience',company:'EmComp - Computer Science Junior Company',position:'Full-Stack Developer',type:'Full-Time',date:'May 2023 - Present',location:'Rio Pomba, Minas Gerais, Brazil',description:'Volunteer work as a Full-Stack developer at EmComp, participating in software development projects and technological solutions for the junior company\'s clients and partners.'}};const Experience=_ref=>{let{language}=_ref;const translation=translations[language];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"experience-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:translation.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:translation.company}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"position",children:translation.position}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:translation.type}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:translation.date}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:translation.location}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{dangerouslySetInnerHTML:{__html:translation.description}})]})})]});};export default Experience;
